snippet: A U.S. prosecutor and a lawyer for a former Blackwater Worldwide security guard on Wednesday presented a jury with starkly different summaries of a 2007 shooting at a Baghdad traffic circle that sparked international outrage and charges of murder ...

headline.print_headline: U.S., Blackwater Defense Clash on Jury Summary of Shooting
headline.main: U.S., Blackwater Defense Clash on Jury Summary of Shooting

lead_paragraph: A U.S. prosecutor and a lawyer for a former Blackwater Worldwide security guard on Wednesday presented a jury with starkly different summaries of a 2007 shooting at a Baghdad traffic circle that sparked international outrage and charges of murder or manslaughter for four guards.
